title: Summer on You
lyrics:
I need just one last time...
I need to spend the summer on you
A last goodbye...
I need another summer with you
One last time...

I need to spend the summer on you

A last goodbye...

I need another summer with you



You were young

Too young, too good to leave us now

You were special

You were a person to be really proud



I believe, I'm doing right

And I need, to be strong inside



I need just one last time...

I need to spend the summer on you

A last goodbye...

I need another summer with you



One last time...

I need to spend the summer on you

A last goodbye...

I need another summer with you
